snippet.title: Redgar: The Space Viking - November Trailer
snippet.description:
An action-packed, story-driven top-down shooter with vibrant pixel graphics and a pumping soundtrack.

Fight your way through hallways of castlelike spaceships, neon lit alleys and futuristic medieval fortifications using an array of powerful weapons and special devices.

AVAILABLE NOW ON STEAM!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1900890/Redgar_The_Space_Viking/
